mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(board_id, board_title, board_status) VALUES(seq_board.nextval, #{board_title}, #{board_status})
mapper.select: SELECT b.posts_id, b.board_id, b.std_id, lpad(' └', (lev-1)*4, ' ')||posts_title as posts_title, b.posts_content, b.posts_date, b.posts_status, b.posts_pno, b.posts_gno FROM( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM (SELECT p.*, level lev FROM posts p WHERE board_id=#{board.board_id} START WITH posts_pno is null CONNECT BY posts_pno = prior posts_id ORDER SIBLINGS BY posts_gno desc) a) b WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{page}-1)*#{pageSize}+1 AND #{page}*#{pageSize}
